name: Tints
description:
Made in approx. 2.5 days.

To come down from programming lots for our recently released L4UR4 game for the MechJam 3, I felt like working out a small concept for a puzzle game. Unfortunately, as I progressed, I began to realize that designing good puzzles was difficult with this concept. Oh well, lessons learned I guess.

Controls
- WASD/ZSQD to move
- R to restart
